00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "TShapeOrientB2.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqMatrix.hpp"
00036 #include "TMPDerivs.hpp"
00037 #include "TMPCommon.hpp"

00039 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00040 
00041 std::string TShapeOrientB2::get_name() const
00042   { return "TShapeOrientB2"; }
00043 
00044 TShapeOrientB2::~TShapeOrientB2() {}
00045 
00046 template <unsigned DIM> static inline
00047 bool eval( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& T, double& result )
00048 {
00049   double tau = det(T);
00050   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00051     result = 0.0;
00052     return false;
00053   }
00054   const double tr = trace(T);
00055   result = (0.5/tau) * (sqr_Frobenius( T ) - DimConst<DIM>::inv() * tr * fabs(tr));
00056   return true;
00057 }
00058 
00059 template <unsigned DIM> static inline
00060 bool grad( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& T, 
00061            double& result, 
00062            MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& deriv_wrt_T )
00063 {
00064   double tau = det(T);
00065   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00066     result = 0.0;
00067     return false;
00068   }
00069   const double b = 0.5/tau;
00070 
00071   const double tr = trace(T);
00072   const double f = DimConst<DIM>::inv() * fabs(tr);
00073   result = sqr_Frobenius( T ) - f * tr;
00074   
00075   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00076   pluseq_scaled_I( deriv_wrt_T, -f );
00077   deriv_wrt_T *= 2*tau;
00078   deriv_wrt_T -= result * transpose_adj(T);
00079   
00080   result *= b;
00081   deriv_wrt_T *= b/tau;
00082   
00083   return true;
00084 }
00085 
00086 template <unsigned DIM> static inline
00087 bool hess( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& T, 
00088            double& result, 
00089            MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& deriv_wrt_T, 
00090            MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>* second_wrt_T )
00091 {
00092   double tau = det(T);
00093   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00094     result = 0.0;
00095     return false;
00096   }
00097   const double b = 0.5/tau;
00098 
00099     // calculate non-barrier value (ShapeOrientAlt1)
00100   const double tr = trace(T);
00101   const double f = DimConst<DIM>::inv() * fabs(tr);
00102   result = sqr_Frobenius( T ) - f * tr;
00103   
00104     // calculate non-barrier first derivatives
00105   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00106   pluseq_scaled_I( deriv_wrt_T, -f );
00107   deriv_wrt_T *= 2;
00108   
00109     // calculate barrier second derivs
00110   const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00111   set_scaled_sum_outer_product( second_wrt_T, -b/tau, deriv_wrt_T, adjt );
00112   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, result/(tau*tau*tau), adjt );
00113   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, -result * b / tau, T );
00114     // calculate non-barrier barrier portion of second derivs
00115   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, 1/tau );
00116   pluseq_scaled_outer_product_I_I( second_wrt_T, DimConst<DIM>::inv()/tau * (tr < 0 ? 1 : -1) );
00117   
00118     // calculate barrier derivs from non-barrier
00119   deriv_wrt_T *= tau;
00120   deriv_wrt_T -= result * adjt;
00121   deriv_wrt_T *= b/tau;
00122   
00123     // barrier value from non-barrier
00124   result *= b;
00125   return true;
00126 }
